LanguageData.Autodoor.label: porte automatique
LanguageData.Autodoor.description: Sépare les pièces. Permet aux personnes de les traverser sans ralentir.
LanguageData.Column.label: colonne
LanguageData.Column.description: colonne capable de supporter un toit. Ne bloque pas la vue ou le mouvement et d'aspect agréable.
LanguageData.Door.label: porte
LanguageData.Door.description: Sépare les pièces. Doit être actionnée manuellement, ce qui ralentit les personnes. Le niveau de ralentissement dépend du matériau de construction de la porte.
LanguageData.Wall.label: mur
LanguageData.Wall.description: Un mur plein, capable de soutenir un plafond.
LanguageData.AnimalFlap.label: animal flap
LanguageData.AnimalFlap.description: A doorway hung with thick overlapping strips of fabric or leather. It allows animals to pass while insulating the temperature. Animal flaps are commonly used as barn doors to give penned animals a sheltered place to sleep.
LanguageData.Fence.label: fence
LanguageData.Fence.description: A fence made of posts joined by crossbars used for building pens for certain kinds of animals. Fences only block certain kinds of animals.
LanguageData.FenceGate.label: fence gate
LanguageData.FenceGate.description: A simple gate made of posts and crossbars. It blocks some animals like a fence. Handlers can lead animals in and out of the pen through these gates.
